Title: Maryland Local Transit - Charm City Circulator Stops [Maryland]
Description: This layer contains the bus stops of the four circulators (Purple, Green, Orange, Banner) as well as the landings/piers for the three Harbor Connector Ferry Routes, which are part of the Charm City Circulator transit system. The layer was converted from GTFS format to GIS format.Any and all variations are displayed in this layer.Created by Central Maryland Regional Transit (CMRT).This is a MD iMAP hosted service. Find more information onhttps://imap.maryland.gov.Feature Service Layer Link:https://geodata.md.gov/imap/rest/services/Transportation/MD_LocalTransit/FeatureServer/12
Creator: DoIT
